p: Fresh leaves (9 kg) were used for the extraction of essential oil resulting in 2.34 g of essential oil. Therefore, the yield of essential oil extraction by hydrodistillation was 0.026% ± 0.003. In the chemical composition analysis of the essential oil, 13 compounds were identified, representing a total of 99.5% of the essential oil, in which 99.3% were sesquiterpenes and 0.3% were monoterpenes. The major compound was β-caryophyllene (57.57%), followed by α-zingiberene (31.72%) ( Figure 1) and α-caryophyllene (3.58%) ( Table 1).
